      • preStart

        public List<PrivilegedOperation> preStart(Container container)
                                   throws ResourceHandlerException
        Pre-start hook for network-tagging-handler. A cgroup is created and a net_cls classid is generated and written to a cgroup file.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        container - Container being launched
        Returns:
